sentences.sContent: As I did, two beautiful cups gleamed from the mantel.
sentences.sContent_eng: As I did, two beautiful cups gleamed from the mantel.
sentences.sCn: 当我这么做的时候，壁炉架上有两座漂亮的奖杯微光一闪。

sentences.sContent: He would display the photograph on the living room mantel.
sentences.sContent_eng: He would display the photograph on the living room mantel.
sentences.sCn: 他也可以在客厅的壁炉边上展示他的照片。

sentences.sContent: Favorite Element: Details from the original construction that were restored by previous owners: the parquet floor design at the entry, the stained glass windows, and carved wood mantel.
sentences.sContent_eng: Favorite Element: Details from the original construction that were restored by previous owners: the parquet floor design at the entry, the stained glass windows, and carved wood mantel.
sentences.sCn: 最喜欢的元素：被前任屋主恢复的房间原始的装饰细节：进门处的镶木地板，上了色的玻璃窗，手工雕刻的木质壁炉架。
